mapper.select: SELECT tuk_seq.nextval as tuk_seq FROM dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BLO_CHOICE (choice_num, mem_id, CHOICE_ID, CHOICE_DATE, CHOICE_STATE) VALUES (#{choiceNum}, #{memId}, #{choiceId}, sysdate, 1)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BLO_CHOICE WHERE mem_id=#{memId} AND choice_id = #{choiceId}
